citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
09/30/2015.
Left a message on the licensees cell phone. She called back and said she would not be at the facility for at least
one hour.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:00 PM on
09/30/2015.
Left a message on the licensees cell phone.  She called back and said she would not be at the facility for at least
one hour.
